SLURM script submission from R: submit_slurm(), script_top(), jobs_top()

parade-scripts-monitoring.Rmd

Requires parade ≥ 0.11.0.

Submit any R script to SLURM and monitor it live—no shell required.

library(parade)
paths_init()

# Optional site defaults (omit mem entirely)
slurm_defaults_set(partition="general", time="2h", cpus_per_task=16, mem=NA, persist=TRUE)
slurm_template_set("registry://templates/parade-slurm.tmpl")

# Submit
job <- submit_slurm("scripts/train.R", args = c("--fold", "1"))

# Quick checks
script_status(job)
script_tail(job, 80)

# Live monitors
script_top(job, refresh = 2, nlog = 40)
jobs_top(list(job), refresh = 3, nlog = 20)

Developed by Parade Authors.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
